abstract: After finishing a deal to buy half of the Cazenove Group five years ago, Chase is expected to take over the entire investment bank.
snippet: After finishing a deal to buy half of the Cazenove Group five years ago, Chase is expected to take over the entire investment bank.
lead_paragraph: JPMorgan Chase is in talks to take control of a prominent British investment bank after striking a deal for half the firm five years ago, a person familiar with the matter said Sunday night.

headline.main: Chase Is Said to Be Buying British Bank
headline.print_headline: Chase Is Said to Be Buying British Bank

abstract: JPMorgan Chase is in talks to take control of prominent British investment bank Cazenove after striking a deal for half the firm five years ago, The New York Times reported Sunday night, citing a person familiar with the matter.
snippet: JPMorgan Chase is in talks to take control of prominent British investment bank Cazenove after striking a deal for half the firm five years ago, The New York Times reported Sunday night, citing a person familiar with the matter.
lead_paragraph: JPMorgan Chase is in talks to take control of a prominent British investment bank after striking a deal for half the firm five years ago, The New York Times’s Eric Dash reported Sunday night, citing a person familiar with the matter.

headline.main: JPMorgan Nears Deal to Buy Rest of Cazenove
